 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקַף‎</span> **verb Niph\`al Hiph\`il** ==overhang, look out and down== (Late Hebrew Niph\`al Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew; compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁקִיפָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">;, ***rocky pinnacle, rock***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ceiling, roof, sky*** (on connection of meaningscompare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***overtop, overlook***, from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be high***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***look down upon***, from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rise***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקְפָה‎</span> [[Judg.5.28|Judg 5:28]]+, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִשְׁקָ֖פָה‎</span> [[Num.21.20|Num 21:20]] (read probably participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנִּשְׁקָפָה‎</span>, compare [[Num.23.28|Num 23:28]], GBG); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקָ֑פְתּי‎</span> [[Prov.7.6|Prov 7:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקָף‎</span> [[Num.23.28|Num 23:28]]; [[1Sam.13.18|1Sam 13:18]]; [[Ps.85.12|Ps 85:12]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקָפָָה‎</span> [[Song.6.10|Song 6:10]] — ***lean over*** (and look), ***lookdown***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span> of window, ***through*** [[Judg.5.28|Judg 5:28]]; [[1Sam.2.16|1Sam 2:16]] = [[1Chr.15.29|1Chr 15:29]]; [[Prov.7.6|Prov 7:6]] absolute ***look down, forth*** [[Song.6.10|Song 6:10]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of direction whence [[Jer.6.1|Jer 6:1]]; [[Ps.85.12|Ps 85:12]] (both figurative); of mountain ***lean over upon*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפְּֿנֵי‎</span>), ***overhang*** [[Num.21.20|Num 21:20]]; [[Num.23.23|Num 23:23]]; [[1Sam.13.18|1Sam 13:18]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגֶּעַ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הגבול‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] and others). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁקִיף‎</span> [[Ps.14.2|Ps 14:2]] +; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁקִיף‎</span> [[Lam.3.50|Lam 3:50]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁקֵף‎</span> [[Gen.19.28|Gen 19:28]]+, etc.;***Imperative*** masculine singular cohortative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקִ֫יפָה‎</span> [[Deut.26.15|Deut 26:15]] — ***look down*** (= **Niph\`al**): with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַד‎</span> of window [[Gen.26.8|Gen 26:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.9.30|2Kgs 9:30]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person v[[2Kgs.9.32|2Kgs 9:32]] ***look down*** upon, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפְּֿנֵי‎</span>, subject person [[Gen.18.16|Gen 18:16]]; [[Gen.19.28|Gen 19:28]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּרְא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.24.20|2Sam 24:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּבֵּט‎</span> in \|\| [[1Chr.21.21|1Chr 21:21]]); especially subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Exod.14.24|Exod 14:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Deut.26.15|Deut 26:15]]; [[Ps.102.20|Ps 102:20]],+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Ps.14.2|Ps 14:2]] = [[Ps.53.3|Ps 53:3]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֵ֫רֶא‎</span> [[Lam.3.50|Lam 3:50]].
